programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Hosts and judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome 10 talented chefs to Ciao House, where they will live together in a beautiful Tuscan villa and be tested like never before on their proficiency with Italian cuisine. Two chefs receive a huge advantage going into the next round, and one chef must say "Ciao Ciao" to the villa.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Tomato, Tomato!. Stay-at-home mom Cristina cant believe shes taking on Chef Geoffrey Zakarian in a surprise cooking competition. But Eddie Jackson has more up his sleeve!

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Duck It!. Eddie Jackson hosts a battle royale between investment banker Jonny Fine and celebrity chef Tiffani Faison. Jonny whips up a childhood duck dish to take down Tiffani.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Ostrich Impossible. Eddie Jackson shocks home cook Mike Ryan with a chance to go head-to-head against world-famous chef Robert Irvine. Can Mike achieve the impossible?

programme.title: Chasing Flavor
programme.desc: Chef Carla Hall gets fired up over hot chicken. Her spicy global trek reveals the African American erasure in one of the countrys fried favourites.

programme.title: Chasing Flavor
programme.desc: Shrimp And Grits. Show.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine makes a feast without a kitchen for 30 people in Oahu, Hawaii. He battles the weather and manages an unpredictable underground oven.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert must prepare a 5-star dinner for 60 soldiers. Using only a mobile army field kitchen and meal rations, he has just seven hours to create a high-end dinner.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine goes to Catalina Island for the new tourism season and celebrates the island getting back on its feet. Plus, he helps a restaurant open with a bang.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: In Food Networks series Kids Baking Championship, hosts and judges Duff Goldman and Valerie Bertinelli will lead eight talented kid bakers through challenges designed to find the most-impressive and creative young baker. In each challenge the contestants, ranging in age from 10 to 13, will be tested on their baking skills and originality as they whip up delectable desserts, including creative cakes, mouthwatering cookies and pastries.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine is at the world-famous Cedar Point amusement park in Sandusky, Ohio, to make dinner for 150 superfans celebrating the parks 150th anniversary.

programme.desc: Bobby Flay isnt taking it easy on the new Titan, Ayesha Nurdjaja, as he invites competition winner chef Nini Nguyen, to challenge the Titans.

programme.title: The Great Russian Lie
programme.desc: A documentary series dedicated to debunking the most influential myths of Russian propaganda. The project goes beyond the analysis of ordinary " fake news " to explore the deep historical manipulations that Russia uses as a tool of external aggression and justification of imperial ambitions.

programme.title: It Should Not Had Happened
programme.desc: For every Ukrainian, everything that is happening in our country now is a horror. But there are those who should not experience this at all in the 21st century. Those who should not experience these terrible events in any way. These are children. Millions of Ukrainian children left their homes, said goodbye to their grandparents. Children left behind the toys they used to fall asleep with, playgrounds and parks where they loved to walk with their classmates. Stories of dozens of children from different parts of Ukraine who went through what no child in the world should go through.

Every day. Trusted source.

programme.title: Čalis iznīcina pasauli
programme.desc: Murgu trilleris par Čali – kurlu puisi ar dzīvu iztēli. Kad tiek noslepkavota viņa ģimene, noslēpumaina šamaņa vadīts, Čalis mācās apspiest savu bērnišķīgo fantāziju un izveidot to par nāves ieroci.

programme.title: Divas naktis seksam
programme.desc: Iespējams, ka vienas nakts sekss ar interneta sarakstē tikko iepazītu puisi nav tā labākā ideja. Bet sniega vētras dēļ iestrēgt ar viņu vienā dzīvoklī pirms pašiem Ziemassvētkiem – tas jau ir par daudz! Vai arī tā ir negaidīta iespēja labāk iepazīt vienam otru? Un pienācīgi atstrādāt šādas tādas kustības gultā?

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Titāniks
programme.desc: Savā pirmajā braucienā dodas pasaules lielākais kuģis "Titāniks". Uz kuģa klāja tūkstošiem cilvēku ar cerībām un bailēm gaida nokļūšanu galamērķī – Amerikā. Starp šiem cilvēkiem ir nabadzīgs mākslinieks Džeks, kā arī septiņpadsmit gadus vecā Roza – skaista un bagāta meitene, kurai apnikusi vecāku ārišķīgā un liekulīgā pasaule. "Titānika" būvētāji ir pārliecināti par to, ka kuģi nav iespējams nogremdēt, taču, kad kuģa ceļā gadās milzīgs aisbergs, Rozas un Džeka romantiskais piedzīvojums pārvēršas cīņā par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: ASV Valsts Aizsardzības dienestam ir nozagta slepena mikroshēma. Noziedznieki cer to pārdot un nopelnīt miljoniem dolāru, taču vērtīgā prece nejauši ir nokļuvusi rotaļlietu mašīnā, kas patlaban atrodas kādā mājīgā Čikāgas savrupnamā. Noziedznieki dodas mikroshēmu atgūt. Ceļā viņiem stājas bīstams pretinieks Alekss – astoņgadīgs puišelis, kuram netrūkst izdomas un kurš ir viens pats mājās.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Lauva Alekss ir Ņujorkas Centrālparka zoodārza karalis. Arī viņa labākie draugi zebra Mārtijs, žirafe Melmens un nīlzirgu meitene Glorija visu dzīvi šajā idilliskajā nebrīvē saņēmuši zoodārza apmeklētāju apbrīnu. Taču Mārtijs klusībā kaļ plānus par bēgšanu, un ar dažu apbrīnojami uzņēmīgu pingvīnu palīdzību viņam izdodas izrauties pasaulē, ko viņš sen sapņojis iepazīt. Alekss, Melmens un Glorija viņam seko, taču tiek notverti un nosūtīti uz Āfriku. Kad pingvīni sabotē kuģa komandu, Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmens un Glorija attopas izskaloti eksotiskās Madagaskaras krastā. Nu četriem ņujorkiešiem nākas izdzīvot savvaļā, un tas ir sasodīti grūti.

programme.title: Atsitiens
programme.desc: Endrjū ir jauns un ambiciozs džeza bundzinieks, gatavs kļūt par labāko no labākajiem ASV austrumu krasta mūzikas vidusskolā, atspēriena punktā uz lielo skatuvi. Despotiskais pasniedzējs Terenss pamana Endrjū un iekļauj viņu džeza orķestra sastāvā, uz visiem laikiem izmainot jaunieša dzīvi. Endrjū vēlme kļūt par labāko drīz pārvēršas apsēstībā, un Terensa nežēlīgās mācību metodes nostāda viņu gan uz fizisko spēju, gan arī saprāta robežas. Filma saņēmusi galveno žūrijas balvu un skatītāju balvu Sandensas filmu festivālā, trīs "Oskarus" kategorijās "Labākais otrā plāna aktieris", "Labākā montāža", "Labākā skaņas apstrāde", tāpat arī trīs britu "BAFTA" balvas. Filmas režisors ir Deimiens Čazels, kurš ir ieguvis arī "Oskaru" par muzikālo drāmu "La La Land: Kalifornijas sapņi" 32 gadu vecumā, tādejādi kļūstot par jaunāko režisoru, kurš ieguvis Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas prestižo apbalvojumu.

programme.title: Blūmu ģimenes stāsts
programme.desc: Sema ir aktīvā dzīvesveida piekritēja, taču ģimenes ceļojumā pa Taizemi notiek nelaime – viņa neveiksmīgi nokrīt no balkona, savaino mugurkaulu un paliek daļēji paralizēta. Semas vīrs, trīs dēli un māte visādi mēģina palīdzēt un uzmundrināt sievieti, kura ir zaudējusi dzīvesprieku un slīgst arvien dziļāk depresīvā noskaņojumā. Pēkšņi mājas pagalmā uzrodas ievainots žagatas mazulis, kuru ģimene adoptē un nosauc par Pingvīnu. Neviens gan nebija iedomājies, ka tieši Pingvīns būs tas, kurš palīdzēs Semai atkal saskatīt dzīvei jēgu un atgūt optimismu.

programme.title: Maģiskās durvis
programme.desc: Divi praktikanti Pols un Sofija uzsāk karjeru noslēpumainā Londonas uzņēmumā "J.W. Wells and Co". Drīz abi atklāj, ka viņu darba devēji, tostarp harizmātiskais izpilddirektors Hamfrijs Velss un menedžeris Deniss Taners, ievieš revolucionāras pārmaiņas – modernās korporatīvās stratēģijas te tiek apvienotas ar senām burvestībām. Uzņēmuma noslēpumam nākot gaismā, Sofijai un Polam tiek dots uzdevums: atrast spēcīgu maģisku artefaktu - durvis, kas ikvienu acumirklī var aizvest uz jebkuru vietu pasaulē. Tas izrādīsies mīklām, izaicinājumiem un pārdabiskām intrigām pilns ceļojums, jo izgaismos bīstamu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz "J.Wells and Co".

programme.title: Svēto un grēcinieku zemē
programme.desc: Bijušais algotais slepkava ķeras pie ieroča vēl vienu pēdējo reizi, kad viņa mierīgajā Īrijas ciemā ierodas terorists.

programme.title: Pagraba durvis
programme.desc: Meklējot jaunu dzīves sākumu pēc spontānā aborta, pāris saņem dāvanā savu sapņu māju ar vienu nosacījumu – viņi nekad nedrīkst atvērt pagraba durvis. Vai viņi var dzīvot, nezinot, kas tur ir? Šī iekšā cīņa ar neziņu izraisa šokējošas sekas.

programme.title: Spiegs
programme.desc: Gudrā, bet kompleksu māktā CIP analītiķe Sjūzena Kūpere (Melisa Makārtija) gadiem ir bijusi nozīmīga spēlētāja veiksmīgā svarīgu operāciju norisē. Kad pazūd viņas pārinieks, Sjūzenai beidzot ir iespēja iejusties slepenās aģentes ādā. Izliekoties par kaķu mīļotāju un ar grūtībām tiekot galā ar tehnoloģijām, Sjūzena cenšas izdzīvot straujajā spiegošanas pasaulē. Vai viņai izdosies īstenot sapni būt par īstu spiedzi un īstenot uzdevumu?

programme.title: Nelikumība
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par nelāgas slavas apvītajiem Bondurānu brāļiem – trim kukurūzas kandžas dzinējiem, kuri cenšas sasniegt amerikāņu sapni laikā, kad valda sausais likums. Virdžīnijā, Frenklinas apgabala kalnos, pārdzīvojuši karu, Bondurānu brāļi ar ieročiem cīnās par savu biznesu un ģimenes cieņu un kļūst par vietējo leģendu. Kamēr jaunākais brālis Džeks met acis uz skaisto Bertu, vienmēr drūmais vidējais brālis Forests visus tur aizdomās par krāpšanu, vecākajam – Hovardam – nākas risināt riskantā ģimenes biznesa problēmas. Laiki nav no vieglajiem, un štatā valda bezdarbs, taču Bondurāni ir uzņēmēji, kas aizsākuši plaukstošu vietējo biznesu, dzenot stipru un iecienītu sīvo, kas iesaukts par "mēnesnīcu". Taču kandžas dzinēju labās dienas Frenklinas apgabalā iet uz galu, jo pilsētā no Čikāgas ieradies specaģents Čārlijs Reiks. Jaunais "likums", ko pūlas iedibināt Reiks, nes nāvi un veicina korupciju. Tas rada šķēršļus brāļu iecerēm un ideāliem. Tomēr Bondurāni ir apņēmušies nelocīt ceļus neviena priekšā.

programme.title: Ja es spētu izstāstīt
programme.desc: Denijs Svifts ir pirmās formulas sacīkšu braucējs, taču bez autosporta viņš dievina arī savu skaisto sievu, mazo meitiņu un labāko draugu suni Enzo, kurš nākamajā dzīvē vēlas pārdzimt kā cilvēks. Suņu mīļotāji allaž uzskata, ka viņu suņi ir pilntiesīgi ģimenes locekļi, kuri spēj saprast cilvēku sacīto, izprot notikumus un ir uzticami līdz savai pēdējai stundiņai. Un nudien - tieši tāds suns ir Enzo. Viņa ikdiena lielākoties aizrit, skatoties televīziju un apgūstot visu iespējamo par sava īpašnieka lielāko aizraušanos - braukšanu ar sacīkšu auto. Viņš piedzīvo gan Denija laulības, gan viņu meitas Zojas piedzimšanu. Savas spēcīgās ožas dēļ viņš ir arī pirmais, kurš saprot, ka Denija sievai attīstās smadzeņu vēzis...

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Ķieģeli pa ķieģelītim
programme.desc: Animācijas filma "Lego" klucīšu stilā par Farela Viljamsa dzīvi. Filmā, kurā galvenās lomas ierunājis pats Farels Viljamss (Pharrell Williams), kā arī Kendriks Lamārs (Kendrick Lamar) un Džastins Timberleiks (Justin Timberlake), ķieģelīti pa ķieģelītim tiek pārskatīta mākslinieka karjera.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Strops satraukti dūc – nupat novākta vasaras medus raža. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai Medus spēlēs? Maijas jaukais satraukums zūd, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju piedalīties spēlēs, pārstāvot savu stropu. Cenzdamās pierādīt stropa karalienei, ko bites spēj, Maija apsola gūt uzvaru Medus spēlēs un glābt stropa medu. Karaliene piekrīt, bet atgādina, ka, vedot komandu cīņā, Maijai vispirms jāiemācās uzklausīt citus. Maija piedalās spēlēs kopā ar labāko draugu Villiju un seno biedru vaboļu komandu. Drīz viņa sastop skaudīgo bitīti Vijolīti no Zumtropoles, kura ar viltu cenšas atņemt Maijas komandai uzvaru. Bitītei nākas piedzīvot viltus rūgtumu, taču negodīgā Vijolīte un viņas komanda arī iekuļas ķibelē.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Kā lauvam, zebrai, žirafei, nīlzirgam, bariņam pingvīnu, lemuru un pērtiķu tikt cauri Eiropai, nepievēršot sev lieku uzmanību? Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un viņu draugi pievienojas ceļojošajam cirkam, cerībā atkal nokļūt mājās, Ņujorkā. Melmens iemācīsies staigāt pa virvi, karalis Džūljens neglābjami iemīlēsies... Īsi sakot - viņu mājupceļš būs īsts cirks!

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Terra Villijs - planēta nezināmais
programme.desc: Kad kosmosa kuģis cieš avāriju un Villijs tiek nošķirts no saviem vecākiem, viņš nokļūst uz mežonīgas un neizpētītas planētas, kur ar izdzīvošanas robota Baka palīdzību būs jānoturas, līdz ieradīsies glābšanas komanda.

programme.title: Neiznīcināmie
programme.desc: Bruņoti līdz zobiem, bet vai tiešām neiznīcināmi? Komanda cieš zaudējumus: Bārnijs Ross izstājas no ierindas, bet Lī Kristmasam anulē pielaidi pie turpmākajām operācijām. Vienībai pievienojas jauni kaujinieki, kuriem jāpadara iesāktais līdz galam, taču arī viņi cieš neveiksmi. Tagad Lī vienatnē nāksies iekļūt ienaidnieka midzenī un atbrīvot sagūstīto komandu, paralēli novēršot globāla mēroga katastrofu. Tikai tā ir iespējams izglābt pasauli un atjaunot Neiznīcināmo reputāciju.

programme.title: Pasakainais četrinieks
programme.desc: Filma vēsta par divām draudzenēm, kuras dodas ceļojumā, lai būtu līgavas māsas savai koledžas draudzenei pārsteiguma kāzās.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: NBA. NBA All-Star Saturday Night
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Olympiacos - Crvena Zvezda
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Six Nations. Wales - France
programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A family is ready to give up surfside California for the Colorado River in Arizona. They love boats, jet skis and want plenty of space for their toys.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Busy professionals and parents search for a remote waterfront home in Rangeley, Maine. But shes more concerned about wild animals.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Real estate professionals are searching for a new home in Lake Elsinore, California. They want an active lifestyle and waterfront views.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: An active couple is relocating to Indian Lake, OH, to spend more time on their boat with family and friends. Theyre searching for a move-in ready home with direct water access to the lake and a large yard for their dog.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Bahamas Life

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: With their six kids nearly all grown up, a Dayton couple is hoping to find a large lake house. Not only do they need a lot of bedrooms and baths, they also need yard space for their rescue dog Charlie.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Windy City Rehab: Alisons Dream Home
programme.desc: Alisons big idea turns into a big problem when she doesnt have the money for her biggest personal renovation ever. Will she be able to pull it off?

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The crew has two large projects to juggle-the kids explore big ideas for the four bedrooms on the second floor, while the basement needs its walls demolished and new floors to be poured if they are to keep on schedule for the future family room.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler fix what they refer to as "Frankenstein" houses. These are older homes that have become filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways as different owners make changes over the years. Mike employs his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces. Throughtout the episodes, Mike and Denese will overcome choppy rooms and wasted square footage for clients and work with their dads -- master carpenters John Butler and Peter Doyle -- to deliver one-of-a-kind projects for each family.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: An active couple is relocating to Indian Lake, OH, to spend more time on their boat with family and friends. Theyre searching for a move-in ready home with direct water access to the lake and a large yard for their dog.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A couples ready to go from two homes to one in Wilton Manors, Florida. Theyre looking for a great water view with yard space for their pups.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A young couple moves from Colorado Springs to Carolina Beach, NC, so they can be near the water. They hope to find a home with enough space for the family and room for a pool, but also dream of being close to the beach.

programme.desc: A couple relocates from Vancouver to a waterfront home in Guanacaste, Costa Rica. He wants a modern place near town, she prefers a Spanish style.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Busy professionals and parents search for a remote waterfront home in Rangeley, Maine. But shes more concerned about wild animals.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Real estate professionals are searching for a new home in Lake Elsinore, California. They want an active lifestyle and waterfront views.

programme.title: Renovation
programme.desc: Renovation 911 follows emergency restoration experts and sisters, Kirsten Meehan and Lindsey Uselding, as they rescue homes in Minneapolis that have recently experienced unexpected and tragic property disasters.

programme.title: Renovation
programme.desc: Renovation 911 follows emergency restoration experts and sisters, Kirsten Meehan and Lindsey Uselding, as they rescue homes in Minneapolis that have recently experienced unexpected and tragic property disasters.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists have long proposed that Earth is an extraterrestrial laboratory. If so, does it extend beyond humans into the animal kingdom? Accounts of animalist gods can be found across the globe that curiously mirror alien encounters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Sunshine State Steals. Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists have long proposed that Earth is an extraterrestrial laboratory. If so, does it extend beyond humans into the animal kingdom? Accounts of animalist gods can be found across the globe that curiously mirror alien encounters.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Tales From Oak Island
programme.desc: A journey to one of the most mysterious places in the world, Oak Island.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists have long proposed that Earth is an extraterrestrial laboratory. If so, does it extend beyond humans into the animal kingdom? Accounts of animalist gods can be found across the globe that curiously mirror alien encounters.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making some revolutionary deals in Boston, Massachusetts. The guys have a wicked awesome visit as they check out a Patriotic painting, try their hand at rowing, and take aim at a Brown Bess musket from the 1700s.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum saddle up and head deep into the heart of Texas! In Fort Worth, the trio unearths a treasure trove including a rare Gretsch White Penguin guitar, a Smith and Wesson revolver, and a "Wonder Man" comic signed by Stan Lee.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Some of the worlds most valiant figures overcome the most treacherous, impossible, and downright bizarre circumstances. Like a man who survives the apocalypse, or a woman involved in not one, but three maritime disasters.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." Hosted by Academy Award® winner Morgan Freeman, each episode will unearth every step of an inmates meticulous plan, the escape route and the intense manhunt that immediately followed.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The Burning Bush, the 10 Plagues, the Parting of the Red Sea...these Biblical events in the Book of Exodus have shaped Judeo Christian beliefs for centuries. But were these events divine miracles, or do they have a more earthly explanation?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making big deals in the smallest state! In Providence, Rhode Island, the guys cruise over to a muscle car collection, check out a rare book written by John Adams, and take aim at a harpoon gun.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hitting the road to look for treasures in Tampa, Florida. Helming a crew of experts, the guys will plunder everything from Pokemon cards to Steve McQueens motorcycle, hoping to make waves in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant eighteen wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: In 1997, thousands of people across Phoenix witness a series of strange lights unlike anything theyve ever seen. Could this be one of the largest-scale UFO sightings in history, or is there another explanation?

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel exist because of advances in engineering. What happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics and dramatic moment of disaster footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: What if the history you knew was only half the story? Brad Meltzers Decoded investigates the other half: the secret history of the symbols and codes that surround us everyday. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer has been writing novels for more than a decade. He has studied and written about some of the most revered institutions and documents in human history, including the U.S. Supreme Court, the Presidency, the Secret Service, Wall Street and the Bible. Brad has assembled a team to investigate the countless clues and theories uncovered through his years of research, but unexplored until now. From the dollar bill to the first Presidential Codes, the hidden messages of the Statue of Liberty and the ciphers protecting the location of lost Confederate gold, the team uncovers the truth behind historys most provocative secrets.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel exist because of advances in engineering. What happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics and dramatic moment of disaster footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: What if the history you knew was only half the story? Brad Meltzers Decoded investigates the other half: the secret history of the symbols and codes that surround us everyday. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer has been writing novels for more than a decade. He has studied and written about some of the most revered institutions and documents in human history, including the U.S. Supreme Court, the Presidency, the Secret Service, Wall Street and the Bible. Brad has assembled a team to investigate the countless clues and theories uncovered through his years of research, but unexplored until now. From the dollar bill to the first Presidential Codes, the hidden messages of the Statue of Liberty and the ciphers protecting the location of lost Confederate gold, the team uncovers the truth behind historys most provocative secrets.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. programme.title: UFO Hunters

Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Stonemasons Jim and Bill Vieira are on a quest to investigate an incredible theory: that the myths and legends weve all been told about giants are actually rooted in fact. Jim has researched over 1,000 accounts of skeletons seven feet tall or over unearthed across America in the 19th and 20th centuries. SEARCH FOR THE LOST GIANTS will follow the Vieira brothers on their quest to find evidence of these missing bones, which seem to have slipped through the hands of history. Theyll dig for secret chambers, explore underground tunnels and dive into the deepest museum storage vaults–all to find that one bone, that one hair, that single strand of giant DNA that will answer the question: did giants walk the Earth?

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Goliath Grouper is a monster fish that inhabits the tropical shallow waters of Florida and the Caribbean. In 1895, the New York Times reported on a monster grouper that measured in at over fifteen-hundred pounds.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: "Missing in Alaska" investigates the region of northwest Alaska, where over 20,000 people have vanished in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. In all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: In an era long passed, mighty empires were forged from nothing and rose to the heights of power. Join host Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University as he travels the world to show the engineering feats that gave rise to some of the greatest civilizations known to man. From Rome to the Pharaohs Egypt, from Greece to Carthage, from the Aztecs to the Maya and more, this new program from the History Channel uses computer graphics to explore the architectural, political and cultural glory of the worlds greatest empires.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Legend tells of the Lost Dutchmans gold mine hidden somewhere within the 160,000 acres of brutal Arizona desert known as the "Superstition Mountains." The promise of a $200 million mother lode has lured thousands of treasure hunters and continues to claim the lives of those eager to decipher the legends clues and riddles. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong Dutch Hunter Wayne Tuttle is breaking with tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. With cursed mountains said to drive men mad and a hidden fortune of gold worth killing for, the treasure hunters greatest danger may be the man at his side. Trust at your own peril if you dare to tread into HISTORYs Legend of the Superstition Mountains.

Trust at your own peril if you dare to tread into HISTORYs Legend of the Superstition Mountains.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: According to documents that were declassified by the FBI in 2014, Adolf Hitler may have survived World War II and fled to South America following the fall of Nazi Germany. In this series a team of investigators -- led by 21-year CIA veteran Bob Baer and war crimes investigator John Cencich -- undertakes a definitive search with the goal of finding out whether the notorious dictator actually survived the war and pulled off one of historys greatest disappearing acts. The team uncovers a mysterious Nazi lair in the Argentinean jungle and searches for evidence of a missing U-boat that may have transported Hitler out of Europe as Germany collapsed.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: It is the last great mystery of WWII. The fabled Yamashita Treasure, a massive stash of gold bars and rubies worth billions, reportedly dumped in a cave by Japanese soldiers retreating from allied forces. While the fortune has become a legend, many experts claim there is no evidence it ever existed. Now, a dedicated group of investigators are resurrecting the dangerous search, using cutting-edge technology in pursuit of the truth, and unimaginable wealth.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: When army manoeuvres shut down the teams journey to restore an ancient minaret, they take a treacherous journey through the White Desert to camp in an oasis. Zahi makes friends with the local Bedouins, who feed the starving group.

programme.title: Ancient Discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: In this series, renowned underwater archaeologist and adventurer Barry Clifford, along with a crack team of on-land explorers and experts, attempts to solve a mystery that dates back hundreds of years.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. programme.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: This segment covers the story of Hannah Elizabeth Graham (1996 - 2014), an 18-year-old second-year British-American student at the University of Virginia who went missing on September 13, 2014. She was last seen early in the morning that day, at the Downtown Mall in Charlottesville, Virginia. Five weeks later, her remains were discovered on an abandoned property in nearby Albemarle County. Jesse Matthew was charged and convicted of murdering Graham and was sentenced to life imprisonment. He was also found guilty of three previous crimes and given three more life sentences.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Every day, countless adults utilize the internet with insidious intentions to groom, sexually exploit, and abuse children online. Committed to helping law enforcement stop these perpetrators, child advocate Roo Powell and the team at her nonprofit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) work in collaboration with law enforcement to detect and identify the menacing adults who use the internet to harm children. Undercover Underage follows Roo as the 38-year-old mother of three transforms her appearance into a teen online. Once adults engage with Roos underage decoys, its a race against the clock to gather enough information to positively identify the offenders and get them on law enforcements radar.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: A person suddenly and unexpectedly disappears; no trace, no clues, nothing but the lingering mystery they leave behind. According to the FBIs National Crime Information Center, there are now 110,484 active missing persons cases in the U.S., 53% are juveniles under the age of 18. Most of us have heard of the high-profile cases, such as Natalee Holloway, Stacey Peterson, and Chandra Levy. But have you ever heard of Mae Catherine Rocker, Alexis Peterson or Thomas Jay Kerr? Probably not. They are just a few of the hundreds of thousands of people in this country who one day, simply Disappeared. Most missing persons stories have never been told...until now. Disappeared is an exciting series that investigates the disappearance of these victims, who are here one minute, gone the next. Each episode focuses on one victims story, as told through the perspectives and actual voices of their closest friends and family and the investigators trying to solve the case. Through interviews with family, friends, police, and searchers, each episode recounts the actions, thoughts, circumstances and motivations that led to each persons disappearance. Experience the victims final hours until they vanished. Watch interviews with experts, from psychologists to forensic specialists to psychics, who will offer new insights into what may have happened in each case, whether the person was a victim of foul play or a runaway. Disappeared will take you inside the world of the missing, where a person can vanish without a trace, investigators race against the clock to solve a mystery, and the victims anguished family and friends are left to wonder what in the world could have happened.
